Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Texas in 1981...
Injured on 4/11/1982 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Traded from Texas to Baltimore on 7/31/1982 (Going to TEX: P R. Camp. Going to BAL: LF P. Bradley)...
Had first career hit on 6/19/1983, off Mark Lemongello (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/2/1983, off Brent Strom (OAK)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cleveland on 8/17/1984...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Minnesota on 9/24/1985...
Injured on 5/12/1986 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1986, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 5/16/1988...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/9/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $1,111,111 per year...
Injured on 8/20/1990 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
